message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its innovative features and high-quality materials. Given its exceptional value, I believe it's worth more than $120 to you. To make this opportunity accessible, I'm offering it to you for $150. This includes a limited-time discount of 10% off the original retail price. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits of our product. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you're adding to the product, but based on my research and personal needs, I believe I can find a similar product at a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $120 for this product. Please let me know if this price aligns with your expectations.
